name: Plug!
description:
A fast-paced pixel platformer - play it loud!

Not an easy game - can you handle it? Or will you rage out?

+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
| PROTOTYPE FOR FEEDBACK - New features and levels always being added. |
| If you want more, please tell me in the comments, thank you.         |
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+

Speedrun Mode

When switched on, enemies, platforms and anything moving will always start in the same direction, and same cadence. 

You can see speed run results on "Choose Room" from the Main Menu.

Simple Controls

It's left, right and jump...

  • Move with Left & Right arrow keys, or A & D, or J & L - or Gamepad
  • Jump with Up arrow, or W, I, or Shift - or Gamepad

Fill your Power Shield by running over floors and then...

  • Launch your Power Shield with Space or Control - or Gamepad

Return to Menu with Escape (or move to the left of the start position).

Game Options
  • Switch music on/off
  • Switch sound on/off
  • High Performance mode
  • No Enemies mode
